title: ESIC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 40 Senior Resident, Specialist Posts
description: The Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC) has officially released the notiifcation to fill the vacancies of 40 Junior Engineers, Senior Residents,and  Specialists. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Civil, Electrical Engineering, PGDM, can apply for the ESIC Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in intervie...
